mapper.select: SELECT RE.REPLY_ID, RE.POST_COMMENT_ID, RE.MEMBER_ID, RE.COMMENT_CONTENT, RE.CREATE_AT, RE.MODIFIED_AT, MEM.NICKNAME FROM REPLY RE JOIN MEMBER MEM ON RE.MEMBER_ID = MEM.MEMBER_ID WHERE RE.POST_COMMENT_ID=#{postCommentId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY (REPLY_ID, POST_COMMENT_ID, MEMBER_ID, COMMENT_CONTENT, CREATE_AT, MODIFIED_AT) VALUES (REPLY_ID_SEQ.nextval, #{postCommentId}, #{memberId}, #{commentContent}, SYSDATE, NULL)
mapper.update: UPDATE REPLY SET COMMENT_CONTENT = #{commentContent} , MODIFIED_AT = SYSDATE WHERE REPLY_ID = #{replyId}
